metadata.job_to_be_done: building a balanced and creative weekly meal plan that includes quick, healthy, and diverse recipes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
Ingredients:
• 6 large eggs
• 1/4 cup milk
• 1/2 cup shredded cheese
• 1/4 cup diced bell pepper

Ingredients:
• 1 pound chicken breast, cubed
• 1/2 pound sausage, sliced
• 1/2 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined
• 1 small onion, diced
• 2 cloves garlic, minced
• 1 bell pepper, diced
• 1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes
• 1 cup chicken broth
• 1 cup long-grain rice
• 1 teaspoon paprika
• 1 teaspoon thyme
• 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
• Salt and pepper to taste
Instructions:
• In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat. • Cook cubed chicken and sliced sausage until browned, then set aside. • In the same pot, sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and diced bell pepper until softened.

• Ingredients:
o 4 cups green beans
o 1 can cream of mushroom soup
o 1/2 cup milk
o 1 cup fried onions
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
• Instructions:
o Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). o Cook green beans until tender. o Mix soup, milk, salt, and pepper in a baking dish.

• Ingredients:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1/4 cup olives
o 1/4 cup feta cheese
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions:
o Dice tomatoes and cucumber, slice red onion. o Mix vegetables with olives and crumbled feta cheese. o Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, and salt, then pour over salad.

• Ingredients:
o 4 potatoes
o 1 cup heavy cream
o 1/2 cup milk
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/2 cup grated Gruyère cheese
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
• Instructions:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Peel and thinly slice potatoes. o Rub a baking dish with a cut clove of garlic.

• Ingredients:
o 2 cups giant beans
o 1 small onion
o 2 cloves garlic
o 4 tomatoes
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 1 teaspoon oregano
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
• Instructions:
o Soak beans overnight, then cook until tender. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, and pepper, simmer for 10 minutes.

• Ingredients:
o 4 tomatoes
o 1 cucumber
o 1 small red onion
o 1 bell pepper
o 2 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup olive oil
o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar
o 1 teaspoon salt
o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
• Instructions:
o Dice tomatoes, cucumber, onion, and bell pepper. o Blend vegetables with minced garlic, olive oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper until
smooth. o Chill for at least 1 hour before serving.

• Ingredients:
o 1 baguette
o 1/2 cup butter
o 4 cloves garlic
o 1/4 cup parsley
o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions:
o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Slice baguette in half lengthwise. o Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and salt.

• Ingredients:
o 4 potatoes
o 1/4 cup soy sauce
o 2 tablespoons sugar
o 1 tablespoon sesame oil
o 1/4 cup water
o 1 tablespoon sesame seeds
• Instructions:
o Peel and dice potatoes. o Sauté potatoes in sesame oil until lightly browned. o Add soy sauce, sugar, and water, simmer until potatoes are tender.

• Ingredients:
o 2 cups cassava flour
o 4 cups water
• Instructions:
o Bring water to a boil. o Gradually add cassava flour, stirring constantly until thickened. o Continue to cook, stirring, until smooth and elastic.
